### Put users first

Regardless of what our role is, we always reflect whether what we are doing really represents something valuable for our users.

### Go the extra mile

We believe that exceptional achievements arise from consistent effort and a profound passion for our work. Understanding that the journey is as important as the destination, we embrace our work with commitment and exceeding expectations. Our hands-on approach celebrates going the extra mile as a natural outcome of our passion-driven efforts.

### Communicate with structure

We want our discussions and projects to revolve around well-founded ideas, ensuring thorough evaluation before sharing with colleagues. We prioritise efficient communication to minimize inherent frictional costs.

### Dive deep

In order to create effective solutions and make informed decisions, we must have a deep understanding of things. It means not being satisfied with the first, easy answer, but instead questioning assumptions, analysing data, and reviewing all possible options. Striving for a complete understanding fosters effective problem-solving and innovation.

### Raise the bar

Our collective success relies on the skills of each team member. We constantly challenge ourselves and raise the bar for higher performance. We work together and grow as a top team.

### Act today over tomorrow

We value the power of taking action over lengthy analysis. It doesn't mean we act without thinking, but that we believe in the importance of moving forward and making progress, even if conditions aren't perfect. We believe that something done today holds more value than one done tomorrow.

### Embrace feedback

We base our relationships on immediate and meaningful feedback. While giving and r

# Pay online with Satispay

Seamless payments on all your favourite websites. Pay for what you need: easy, fast, and secure.

Download the app

**Download the app and**

**get 5â‚¬**

with the promocode: WEB

![](https://www.datocms-assets.com/133951/1737978066-qr_code_svg_giftcard_mainpage.svg)

![Una donna procede ad un acquisto online con Satispay come mezzo di pagamento](https://www.datocms-assets.com/133951/1722416443-shutterstock_645550855.jpg)

## Fulfill every wish... online

For certain online purchases, thereâ€™s no time to waste: a flash sale to snatch up, essential groceries for home delivery, or that special item you just added to your cart. Yes, that purchase truly deserves a happy ending.

Luckily, Satispay is here to turbocharge your desires. And what a boost: you only need a few seconds to pay. Then youâ€™ll see the best message in the world appear on your screen: â€œPurchase successfully completed.â€

[Discover the full list of stores accepting online payments with Satispay!](https://lp.satispay.com/onboarding/dove-pagare-online)

![](https://www.datocms-assets.com/133951/1722416503-shutterstock_2055251369.jpg)

![](https://www.datocms-assets.com/133951/1722416558-shutterstock_1819352888.jpg)

## **Ready for your next purchase?**

Satispay is the most convenient choice for everyday purchasesâ€”and for the ones that make you say **wow!**

- **Tickets for the front-row concert experience**
- **Groceries delivered when you want them**
- **The train ticket for a weekend getaway**
- **A monthâ€™s supply of cat food**
- **Ski passes for the whole family's winter holiday**

![](https://www.datocms-assets.com/133951/1722416616-shutterstock_2455910659.jpg)

## All you need is (on) Satispay

- **Thousands of online stores are partnered with Satispay.** You can find everything you need and much more: from clothing and electronics to publishing, entertainment, and sports.

- **More than just shopping.** You can also use Satispay to pay for train and concert tickets, or even subscribe to your favourite streaming service.

- **Choosing Satispay** as your solution for all online payments is exceptionally simple.

## Your favourite stores are already here

But we continue to grow every day. Over 400,000 stores already accept Satispay. If you know a place that isn't on board yet and you'd like to bring them in, now is your chance.

![](https://www.datocms-assets.com/133951/1721930387-trenitalia.svg)

![](https://www.datocms-assets.com/133951/1721903065-decathlon.svg)

![](https://www.datocms-assets.com/133951/1721930399-veralab.svg)

![](https://www.datocms-assets.com/133951/1721930437-vivaticket.svg)

![](https://www.datocms-assets.com/133951/1721930413-atida-efarma.svg)

![](https://www.datocms-assets.com/133951/1721930426-q8.svg)

## How to pay online with Satispay

Filled your cart and ready to check out? It couldnâ€™t be easier. All you need is your phone handy. Speed is our strength.

![](https://www.datocms-assets.com/133951/1728284517-it-p-pagare-pagare-online-step1.webp)

01

### Go to payment

Choose Satispay as your payment method.

![](https://www.datocms-assets.com/133951/1728284536-it-p-pagare-pagare-online-step2.webp)

02

### Confirm

Enter the mobile number associated with your Satispay profile, or scan the QR Code.

![](https://www.datocms-assets.com/133951/1728284547-it-p-pagare-pagare-online-step3.webp)

03

### All done

Tap Send, and youâ€™re done. Your purchase is complete.

## **Pay and get rewarded with Satispay Points!**

Have you heard about [Satispay Points](https://www.satispay.com/it-it/privati/punti-satispay-programma-fedelta/)? Every time you pay with Satispay, you accumulate points that you can turn into discounts at over 400,000 physical and online stores, as well as on in-app services. It's simple and rewarding!

- **Earn Points every time you pay with Satispay**
- **Take advantage of Multipliers to earn points faster**
- **Use your Points to get real discounts**

Satispay Points will soon be available to everyone: keep an eye on your email in the coming weeks and get ready for the next revolution.

![Una donna ha cumulato dei punti Satispay acquistando online](https://www.datocms-assets.com/133951/1743503869-loyalty_kvisual1_1920x1080-nosticker.png)

Download the app

Satispay payments prioritize your privacy and security.

To complete a purchase, you won't have to remember or share your card number: you only need your phone.

our decision to join Satispay deserves much more than a thank you. Sign up and receive a 5â‚¬ BonusÂ¹ with the promocode WEB.

## Common questions about online payments

### Which online stores accept Satispay?

All those you can find on our [website](https://lp.satispay.com/onboarding/dove-pagare-online) ðŸ›ï¸

This page is updated continuously: new e-commerce stores where you can pay with Satispay are available every day.

**[Click here and discover how to pay online.](https://satispaysupport.zendesk.com/hc/it/articles/18395694467741-Come-funziona-il-pagamento-online-con-Satispay)**

### Where can I find my Satispay payment receipt?

In the App's Profile - Transactions section!

To view it, just tap the transaction and click on Receipt. Use the Search Transactions bar to speed up your search ðŸ”Ž

ðŸ’¡ If you are unable to view your receipts correctly, update the App to the latest available version.

### I have an issue with an online purchase. What should I do?

Don't worry, it can happen to anyone ðŸ«‚

**1 - Contact the online store**
The first step is to attach the [receipt](https://satispaysupport.zendesk.com/hc/it/articles/18396401661341-Dove-trovo-la-ricevuta-di-pagamento-di-Satispay) of your Satispay payment to your request and ask for assistance from their Customer Care team.

**2 - Contact Satispay**
If you do not receive a response or solution within 10 days, [contact us](https://satispaysupport.zendesk.com/hc/it/articles/18373121111197-Come-posso-contattare-l-assistenza-di-Satispay): we will analyze your request by acti

# Satispay is the app for everyday payments

Itâ€™s simple. Itâ€™s practical. And 6 million people have already chosen it. When you start using it, itâ€™ll feel instantly familiar because itâ€™s designed to value your time and what matters most to you. Weâ€™ll tell you what Satispay is and how it works. That way, weâ€™ll have no more secrets. Just like a great friendship.

Download the app

**Download the app** and

**get 5â‚¬**

with the promocode: WEB

![](https://www.datocms-assets.com/133951/1737978066-qr_code_svg_giftcard_mainpage.svg)

## **Pay, split, save: hereâ€™s how to use Satispay**

**Satispay is an app for mobile payments.** But more importantly, it's a new way to shop at affiliated stores (physical and online), pay for services, save money, and exchange money with others.

Satispay puts shared moments first, and this has always been part of the appâ€™s DNA. Thatâ€™s why when you join Satispay, you become part of a community.

## It works every time with Satispay

Satispay is the perfect payment app for every occasion. Here are some examples where Satispay can truly make a difference.

Pay online

Split the dinner bill

Get discounts

Invest

Save

Create a Group Collection

Pay in-store

### Shop online with ease

Choose Satispay as your payment method and pay at thousands of online stores simply and securely, directly from the app.

[How to pay online](https://www.satispay.com/en-it/privati/pagare/online/)

### Send and request money

Split the dinner bill with friends or settle up the cost of a group gift. Put people first, not the transaction.

[How to send and request money](https://www.satispay.com/en-it/privati/invia-ricevi-denaro/)

![](https://www.datocms-assets.com/133951/1771498342-eng-loyalty.png)

### Discover Satispay Points

Earn Points and get discounts on your purchases at 400,000 physical and online stores and in-app services. It's easy, fast, and free.

[Discover more](https://www.satispay.com/en-it/privati/punti-satispay/)

![](https://www.datocms-assets.com/133951/1771498302-eng-invest.png)

### Get more from your savings

âœ“ Invest simply and with **no minimum amount**

âœ“ Withdraw your money **whenever you want, with no constraints**

âœ“ **Worry-free**, with huge advantages

[How to invest](https://www.satispay.com/en-it/privati/investimenti/)

### Save money and make your projects come true

Create a personalized Money Box, set a savings goal, and choose 3 ways to start accumulating money.

[How to create a Money Box](https://www.satispay.com/en-it/privati/risparmi-salvadanai/)

### Set up a Group Collection in seconds

We like ambitious goals. With the app, you can collect money in a flash and say goodbye to endless calls and messages.

[How to set up a Group Collection](https://www.satispay.com/en-it/privati/collette/)

### Pay in-store with Satispay

Pay from your smartphone in a few simple steps at Satispay affiliated stores. All without cards or cash.

[How to pay in-store](https://www.satispay.com/en-it/privati/pagare/negozi/)

## How to use Satispay

Rather than asking what Satispay is for, just start using it. Here are the actions for taking **your first steps in the app.**

### Good news: signing up is super easy!

You only need your current account IBAN, an ID, and a tax ID numberÂ¹. And nothing else.

![](https://www.datocms-assets.com/133951/1771498129-en-p-come-funziona-step1.png)

01

### Set your budget

Choose a minimum amount to top up your Satispay account every week or every month. That way, you never run out of funds.

![](https://www.datocms-assets.com/133951/1771498091-en-p-come-funziona-step2.png)

02

### Manage your funds, your way

Move freely between Satispay and your bank account. Your money will always be where you want it, exactly when you need it.

![](https://www.datocms-assets.com/133951/1771497880-en-p-come-funziona-step3.png)

03

### Use it more, love it more

It takes very little time to take your first steps with the app. But if you want to become a pro user, we have some tips for you.

[Our tips and tricks for you](https://www.satispay.com/en-it/privati/trucchi-suggerimenti/)

# Guided by responsibility, driven by bravery

Our culture isn't just about pretty words; it's actively lived through our concrete actions.

It all starts with our core values â€”responsibility and braveryâ€” and truly comes to life through our pillars.

## Our motto is "act like owners"

Satispay was built by people who took ownership of their ideas and weren't deterred by the obstacles they faced.

This "act like an owner" spirit remains at our core. It means driving change, making a real impact, and embracing every challenge.

[Work with us](https://jobs.ashbyhq.com/satispay?utm_source=ourpeople)

![](https://www.datocms-assets.com/133951/1748426187-satispay-5.jpg)

Previous slideNext slide

## At the heart of our culture, you'll find:

Previous slideNext slide

01

### Curiosity

We constantly seek new solutions and are always ready to learn. Our drive to grow and contribute to something great pushes us forward.

![](https://www.datocms-assets.com/133951/1748426188-satispay-31.jpg)

02

### Mistakes

Taking bold, responsible action means sometimes getting things wrong. We see every mistake as a valuable opportunity to learn fast and improve.

![](https://www.datocms-assets.com/133951/1748426188-satispay-10.jpg)

03

### Trust

Mutual trust is our foundation. It's reflected in our daily commitment to creating real value for our users and supporting each other as a team.

Previous slideNext slide

## **The pillars guiding our choices**

These pillars are our guide: they give concrete shape to our values and transform them into actions. They help us work together, make decisions, and achieve our goals.

01

### Put users first

Regardless of our role, we always ask ourselves if what we are doing represents true value for our users.

02

### Go the extra mile

We believe that exceptional achievements arise from constant commitment and a deep passion for our work. Knowing that the journey is as important as the destination, we face every challenge with dedication, always aiming to exceed expectations. Our hands-on approach celebrates the willingness to always go the extra mile, guided by the passion we put into everything we do.

03

### Communicate with structure

We want our discussions and projects to be based on solid ideas, ensuring we have made thorough evaluations before sharing them with colleagues. We prioritize efficient communication to minimize unnecessary costs.

04

### Dive deep

To create effective solutions and make informed decisions, a deep understanding of things is necessary. This means not settling for the first easy answer, but rather questioning assumptions, analyzing data, and considering all possible options. Aiming for a complete understanding fosters more effective problem-solving and stimulates innovation.

05

### Raise the bar

Our collective success is based on the capabilities of each team member. We constantly challenge ourselves and push beyond our limits. We work together and grow as an excellent team.

06

### Act today over tomorrow

We value action over prolonged analysis. This doesn't mean we make decisions without reflection, but that we believe in the importance of moving forward and making progress, even if conditions aren't perfect. We are convinced that something done today has more value than something done tomorrow.

07

### Embrace feedback

Our relationships are based on immediate and meaningful feedback. Giving and receiving feedback can be challenging, but it is the solid foundation for personal and professional growth.

08

### Be transparent

We prioritize clear and honest communication, and we ensure that our intentions and actions are always transparent and aligned with our commitments. This fosters the building of lasting relationships and a solid, reliable reputation.

09

### Challenge and simplify

We embrace continuous evolution and aim for simplicity, transforming daily challenges into opportunities for growth and efficiency.

10

### Be resource-conscious

We are aware of the impact of all company decisions and operations. Regardless of role or team, each person must evaluate the impact of their actions and decisions on our resources: time, money, and talent.

11

### Go beyond ego

We are aware of the impact of our work and face it by setting our ego aside. We focus on the broader mission and collective goals, prioritizing them over personal recognition.

## Is Satispay the right place for you?

We move fast and aim high. It's an intense and stimulating journey, full of opportunities for growth. We know this dynamic environment isn't for everyone, and we believe it's vital that you find the right place to unlock your full potential.

**In Satispay you'll find:**

- **High performance**. To hit our ambitious goals, we support and challenge one another to achieve what often seems impossible.

- **Speed**. We are biased towards action. Rather than wait for the perfect moment, we act fast to get things done and drive growth.

- **Change**. Constant evolution is in our DNA. We embrace it as an opportunity, not a threat.

![](https://www.datocms-assets.com/133951/1748426188-satispay-12.jpg)

## Transparency above all

We believe open and transparent communication is essential. That's why we prioritise frequent sharing.

Our monthly General Updates are a key moment where the entire company gets updated on results, strategy, and projects.

But transparency is a two-way street: your voice truly matters. Through our quarterly Company Surveys, you have the opportunity to provide anonymous feedback on what works and where we can improve.

[Join the team](https://jobs.ashbyhq.com/satispay?utm_source=ourpeople)

![](https://www.datocms-assets.com/133951/1748247663-dsc3593.jpg)

## A place to thrive

We work every day to build an environment where everyone feels welcome, valued, and empowered to do their best work. Here's how:

Inclusive spaces

Equal opportunities

Community impact

![](https://www.datocms-assets.com/133951/1719520372-icon-scudo.svg)

**Inclusive spaces**

To do our best work, we need to feel supported. We are committed to creating a welcoming environment for all, with inclusive facilities like gender-neutral toilets and a Balance Room.

![](https://www.datocms-assets.com/133951/1748426188-satispay-29.jpg)

![](https://www.datocms-assets.com/133951/1720792256-settings-gear-16.svg)

### Equal opportunities

Our hiring process is designed to be fair and to mitigate bias, ensuring every candidate is assessed on merit alone.

We actively champion diversity, with a strong focus on improving female representation in tech, and partner with initiatives that create opportunities for underrepresented groups.

![](https://www.datocms-

# We don't want to keep any secrets from you

And for this reason, we'll give you all the best tips and tricks to get the most out of the more hidden features. Are you new to the app? Or have you been using it for a while? Here's how to make your Satispay experience even more enjoyable. Explore, learn, and use the app to the fullest.

Download the app

**Download the app and**

**get 5â‚¬**

with the promocode: WEB

![](https://www.datocms-assets.com/133951/1737978066-qr_code_svg_giftcard_mainpage.svg)

![](https://www.datocms-assets.com/133951/1720710874-satispay_house_10397.jpg)

## Downloading the Satispay app is just the beginning

Then you can do everything you need, even from the comfort of your sofa: exchange money with friends, schedule payments, or organize collections. And with these suggestions, it will be even simpler and faster.

### 1. Profile menu

Need to request a payment? Go to **Profile**; next to your name, you'll find a menu to quickly access your personal QR Code.

![](https://www.datocms-assets.com/133951/1771500358-en-p-come-funziona-trucchi-e-suggerimenti-menu-profilo.png)

### 2. Payment options

What do you want to pay with? If, in addition to your Available Balance, you also have Corporate Welfare in your account, you can choose how to make the payment.

![](https://www.datocms-assets.com/133951/1771500358-en-p-come-funziona-trucchi-e-suggerimenti-menu-profilo.png)

### 3. Swipe

Is it time to pay? When you are at the checkout, open your Satispay app and swipe left to scan the QR Code and pay in a flash.

![](https://www.datocms-assets.com/133951/1771500358-en-p-come-funziona-trucchi-e-suggerimenti-menu-profilo.png)

### 4. 3D Touch for your phone top-ups

Don't want to run out of phone credit? If you have an iPhone, long-press a recent top-up and choose to make it recurring, so you never have to think about it again.

![](https://www.datocms-assets.com/133951/1771500358-en-p-come-funziona-trucchi-e-suggerimenti-menu-profilo.png)

### 5. 3D Touch on the icon

In a rush? On iOS, use Haptic Touch (long-press) on the Satispay icon to access quick actions for: **Savings, Top-ups**, and **QR Code**.

![](https://www.datocms-assets.com/133951/1771500358-en-p-come-funziona-trucchi-e-suggerimenti-menu-profilo.png)

![](https://www.datocms-assets.com/133951/1771500358-en-p-come-funziona-trucchi-e-suggerimenti-menu-profilo.png)

## **All about the stores near you**

When you tap on a store icon, you see all the info you need: address, map, social channels, and whether they accept Meal Vouchers and Purchase Vouchers. And if you want to find other stores, even outside your area, use the search bar or change your current location.

![](https://www.datocms-assets.com/133951/1771499715-en-p-come-funziona-trucchi-e-suggerimenti-dettaglionegozio.png)

## To keep your finances always under control

Checking your balance, setting your Budget, and making frequent payments: some things are done more often than others. So why not make them instant? Hereâ€™s how to find what you need in just a few taps and always have funds available to grant every wish.

Available funds

Budget frequency

Contact details

![](https://www.datocms-assets.com/133951/1771499998-en-p-come-funziona-trucchi-e-suggerimenti-disponibilita-residua.png)

### Your balance is always visible

In every section of the app you are in, you can see how much money you have available. Next to the name of the **Stores, Services, or Contacts** pages, you will find the â‚¬ symbol. Tap it to see your total balance.

![](https://www.datocms-assets.com/133951/1771500064-en-p-come-funziona-trucchi-e-suggerimenti-frequenza-budget-1.png)

### Budget as you like it

You have total freedom and flexibility to manage your Budget. Go to _Profile > Manage Balance > Budget > Advanced Settings_ and choose the minimum top-up threshold and the weekly or monthly crediting frequency.

![](https://www.datocms-assets.com/133951/1771500124-en-p-come-funziona-trucchi-e-suggerimenti-frequenza-budget.png)

### Important info about your contacts

With your contacts, you have the most frequent actions close at hand. Tap a contact's icon to see their phone number and check if there are any active recurring payments. Or set one up!

## **How well do you track your expenses?**

On your profile, you will find your transaction history. Use the search bar and choose filters to see how much you spent at your favourite bar or how much money you paid back to your best friend. And, if you need it, download a table of your annual or monthly transactions to always have it handy.

![](https://www.datocms-assets.com/133951/1771500216-en-p-come-funziona-trucchi-e-suggerimenti-download-transazioni.png)

## **Your Group Collections organized with the archive feature**

Too many Group Collections? Put them in the right place with the archive. Long-press the Collection you want to move and select Hide from list. This way, you can declutter and keep only active Collections visible.

![](https://www.datocms-assets.com/133951/1771500281-en-p-come-funziona-trucchi-e-suggerimenti-esplora-lo-storico-delle-transazioni.png)

![QR Code](https://www.datocms-assets.com/133951/1731680553-qr-code.svg)
